text: Apani ki tara prati laksya karechena, ye tara kheyala-khusike sbiya upasya sthira kareche? Allaha jene sune take pathabhrasta karechena, tara kana o antare mahara emte diyechena ebam tara cokhera upara rekhechena parda. Ata'eba, allahara para ke take patha pradarsana karabe? Tomara ki cintabhabana kara na
